div.head: 逆氣搶心
div.div: , counterflow qi knocking at the heart

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: , counterflow qi knocking at the heart

sense.def: Illness Sign of an uncomfortable feeling of qi moving upward from below and striking at the heart depot. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 12: 范汪療胸痹，心中痞堅，留氣結於胸中，胸 滿，脅下逆氣搶心，枳實湯方 , “Fan Wang cures chest blockage, obstacle-illness hardening in the heart, resident qi forming nodes in the chest, a feeling of fullness in the chest below the flanks and counterflow qi knocking at the heart with the recipe for a decoction with zhi shi ”.
